mapper.sql: user_name as userName, real_name as realName, user_mac as userMac, user_mail as userMail, stu_id as stuId, user_id as userId
mapper.insert: insert into t_user(user_name, real_name, password, user_mac, user_mail, stu_id) VALUES (#{userName},#{realName},#{password},#{mac},#{userMail},#{stuId})
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_user where user_name=#{userName}
select count(*) from t_user where user_mac=#{mac}
select count(*) from t_user where user_mail=#{userMail}
select count(*) from t_user where stu_id=#{stuId}
select user_name as userName, user_id as userId, password as password from t_user where user_name=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
